summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting an interview with a victim of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, conducted on December 15, 2019. The victim describes being groomed by Maxwell, meeting Epstein as a minor, being sexually assaulted, and details of the grooming tactics, gifts, and social dynamics within the group.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central perpetrator. The victim describes meeting him through Ghislaine Maxwell, being sexually assaulted by him at Maxwell's residence, and receiving gifts from him.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as grooming the victim, introducing her to Epstein, facilitating and being present during sexual assaults, and using manipulative language similar to the victim's mother.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: Present for the FBI interview of the victim. Represents the U.S. Attorney's Office.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the interview with the victim. Authored the FD-302 report.

connections.description: Worked together to groom and traffic the victim. Maxwell introduced the victim to Epstein and facilitated the sexual assaults.
Maxwell groomed the victim, used manipulative language, and facilitated her sexual abuse by Epstein.
Epstein sexually assaulted the victim on multiple occasions, starting when she was a minor.

events.title: Victim attends modeling school
events.description: The victim attended a modeling school for 6 to 18-year-olds.

events.title: Victim meets Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The victim met Ghislaine Maxwell before turning 17 years old.

events.title: Victim meets Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: The victim met Jeffrey Epstein within the first couple of months of meeting Maxwell.

events.title: First sexual assaults by Epstein
events.description: The victim recalls approximately two assaults by Epstein at Maxwell's residence before she started traveling with them.

events.title: Victim's 18th birthday gift
events.description: The victim received a Miu Miu Prada handbag from Epstein and Maxwell for her 18th birthday, with a tag saying 'Love, Jeffrey and Ghislaine'.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim
events.description: The victim is interviewed by the FBI and an AUSA, providing detailed allegations against Epstein and Maxwell.

locations: New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: The victim was groomed by Ghislaine Maxwell, who used manipulative phrases similar to those used by the victim's own mother to create comfort and compliance.
The victim describes a specific incident where Maxwell opened a door to reveal a naked Jeffrey Epstein, then left them alone, indicating Maxwell's active facilitation of abuse.
The victim received a luxury handbag (Miu Miu Prada) from Epstein and Maxwell for her 18th birthday, with a tag signed by both, indicating grooming through gifts.
Maxwell explicitly told the victim she needed to find someone to give Epstein a 'blowjob,' demonstrating the trafficking aspect of their operation.
The victim was part of a group messaging thread with other Epstein victims but removed herself because she did not want to constantly talk about Epstein.
